verses.text: Right \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w defend|strong="H8199"\w* \w my|strong="H7378"\w* \w cause|strong="H7379"\w* \w against|strong="H7378"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pitiless \w people|strong="H1471"\w*. \w From|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* crafty \w and|strong="H1471"\w* crooked, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w deliver|strong="H6403"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* God \w my|strong="H3588"\w* protector: \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w cast|strong="H2186"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w off|strong="H2186"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* must \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w so|strong="H1980"\w* sadly, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* hard \w pressed|strong="H1980"\w* \w by|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* foe?

\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* light \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* truth, \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w be|strong="H2022"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* \w guides|strong="H5148"\w*: \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* bring \w me|strong="H7971"\w*, \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w place|strong="H6944"\w* \w where|strong="H4908"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* live.

Then \w will|strong="H4196"\w* I go \w to|strong="H4196"\w* Godâ€™s \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w to|strong="H4196"\w* God \w my|strong="H3034"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="H8057"\w*; \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w with|strong="H4196"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w on|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* \w lyre|strong="H3658"\w* I \w will|strong="H4196"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w you|strong="H3034"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w my|strong="H3034"\w* God.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* am \w I|strong="H3588"\w* downcast? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* moaning \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*? \w Hope|strong="H3176"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w help|strong="H3444"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God.
